Title: Lost in Shadows
Description:
Greetings, $n. I find myself in a dire situation. 

Some fresh recruits and I were on patrol in these lands when our torches went out, leaving us utterly lost and disoriented.

I found safety in this house, but most of the recruits fled, confused into the darkness. 

Will you help me locate them? I have a spare Patrol Torch. The mere sight of it should rally them to your side.
ObjectivesText: Find and rally 3 Demoralized Recruits using the Patrol Torch.
RewardText: The time spent with you is much greater training than I could ever provide these recruits. One of them will remain here to aid you further.
